Interface¶

ParametersBase

pb_interface.parametersbase.ParametersBase¶

class pb_interface.parametersbase.ParametersBase[source]¶

Inherit from this class for Policy, Behavior, Consumption, Growdiff, and other groups of parameters that need to have a set_year method. Override this __init__ method and DEFAULTS_FILENAME.

classmethod default_data(metadata=False)[source]¶

Return parameter data read from the subclass’s json file. Parameters ———- metadata: boolean start_year: int or None Returns ——- params: dictionary of data

initialize()[source]¶

Called from subclass __init__ function.

Added expand=True option to turn off expansion of arrays

set_default_vals(known_years=999999)[source]¶

Called by initialize method and from some subclass methods.

simple_eval(param_string)[source]¶
Parses param_string and returns result. `param_string can be either:
  1. param_name op scalar – this will be parsed into param, op, and scalar
    where op is a key in OP_DICT. The corresponding function is applied to the parameter value and the scalar value.
  2. param_name – simply return the parameter value that is retrieved
    from the object

param_string : string of form param op scalar or param

float used for validation
